title: Who Called Off the Pretension Police?
description:
On The Gist, Simon Doonan ponders the rise and fall of pretentiousness in the past 20 years. Doonan writes for Slate and is creative ambassador for Barneys New York.   
For the Spiel, it’s the Lobstar of the Antentwig. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Peach Fish Productions
itunes:subtitle: Simon Doonan and Mike wonder if, in the last 20 years, we’ve seen a decline in the negativity around pretentiousness.
